Dewboy stop trying to find ways out of not having infinite ammo. Grow up a 
little bit and try to act like an adult. Noone has any complaints about not 
having unlimited ammo except for you and if this is a democratic RPG it would 
seem as though you have lost.

--part1_78.28a4f9ae.2a4a2555_boundary
